description:
Get excited for your local trails. This trail bike's geometry keeps you balanced and stable, even when the road is looking a little rowdy. Its larger wheel radius make it easier to bump over roots and rocks. With wide gearing and soft front suspension, the forecast calls for a mix of dust and mud, with 100% chance of fun.

  • SmartForm C3 alloy frame, with stable hardtail geometry
  • SR Suntour M3030 DS suspension fork, with 75mm of travel
  • 2x7 drive train pairs 36-22T chain rings with an 11-34T cassette
  • microSHIFT drivetrain, with a Pro Wheel crankset
  • Tektro mechanical disc brakes
  • KMC Z7 chain
  • Alloy seat post
  • Wheel size: 27.5 (XS) and 29 (S-L)
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Trail 8 Bicycle - Women's
